body.p: To his Excelence thomas E Bramblet govenor of the commonwealth of Kentucky your petitioner E. S. Boman wold Respectible Represent to your Excelence that he was Indited by the Granjury of Whitley county for caring concealed deadley weapens and for an asault wit and that at the last August term of said Courte that he was called and being absent failed to appeare and answer the inditements and the court proseeded to tryal and that a judgment for $50.00 on the inditement for ca conceal deadley weapons was Rend and on the Inditement for asault was a judgement Renderd for $ and ten days imprisonment an he further states that he is a pore m and hard Run and that he turned out as a volunteer in the sevis of his contry in the 7 Reg of Kentucky infantry and Remained in said sevis till the he was discharged on acount of disability he pray your Excelence to Remit the fines and set aside the Judgement and and to Relas him from the imprisenment imposed on him and for all proper Releaf
The under signed Say that they beleave it wold be an act of charity to Remit the fine and set aside the Judgement and &

J. C. Watkins clk
